dct_title_s: Romani Imperii qua occidens est descriptio geographica
dct_description_sm: N. Sanson Abbauillaro Christianissmo Gallvam regis mathematico et geographo autres.
Latitude and longitudinal lines along margin.
Shows classical Europe and North Africa.
Decorative cartouche (with figures in boats), ships, sea monsters.
Additional text in cartouche in upper right.
Appears in Nicolas Sanson II's L'Europe en plusieurs cartes ..., approximately 1648.
dct_publisher_sm: par Melchior Tavernier ... chez Pierre Mariette, rue a l'Esperance
